RegulatoryTrxnFee.name: RegulatoryTrxnFee
RegulatoryTrxnFee.description: Represents the association of regulatory transaction fees with your applications, inspections, or violations.

AccountId.description: The business or personal account that the fee is calculated for.

CalculationDate.description: The date when the fee is calculated.

DueDate.description: The date the fee must be paid by.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date that a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date that a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the record.

ParentRecordId.description: The parent record such as the application, inspection, violation, or license that the fee is calculated for.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the fee.
